posts.post_content:
Bender with trees $40- Sovereign 350 trimmed

Crawford batting SOLD Card measures very big, huge boarders.  Little diamond cut. Does have a faint crease down the middle of the card but very nice card.4

McGraw Glove at Hip SOLD- Measures good

Chance Red Portrait SOLD Measures good has some tiny spots of paper loss on his jersey. Little crease middle left but other than that nice card.

Duffy SOLD Measures good little diamond cut. Small paper loss under knob of bat.

Chance Batting PB Back SOLD Measures good but missing most of name and team name on bottom. Little paper loss on his ear.

Jennings Pb Back- SOLD

All prices will include tracked bubble mailer shipping. Paypal friends please if goods add 3%. Sold comment trumps on going negotiations. Offers always welcomed thanks everyone.  If you do not like pm email is [url]dkiekhefer@gmail.com[/url]
Prices have been lowered thanks for looking
McGraw and Duffy sold only bender left.
